jobTitle: REMOTE Defense Attorney (155-165 hour billables requirement!)
description:
Are you a Defense Attorney interested in joining an established legal firm? We are looking for a motivated and thorough attorney with at least one year of experience in defending clients in lien and litigation cases. If you are interested in taking your career to the next level, this position is for you.

We are open to candidates from junior to senior level.

Top Reasons to Work with Us

At our firm, you will have the opportunity to work with a team of professionals who are committed to delivering the highest standard of service to our clients. Our firm offers a challenging and stimulating work experience designed to help you grow your legal career. We understand that our success is dependent on our team of dedicated professionals, which is why we are committed to providing a supportive and encouraging work environment.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Assume responsibility for cases at all levels of complexity
  • Communicate with clients
  • Develop strategies leading to efficient resolution of cases
  • Negotiate and settle cases-in-chief as well as liens
  • Draft pleadings and reports
  • Handle all aspects of workers compensation litigation

What You Need for this Position

  • 1+ years of either workers compensation or labor & employment experience preferred
  • Valid CA Bar License

What's In It for You

  • Competitive base salary: $140-175,000/Year (DOE)
  • PTO, Holidays, Sick Leave
  • Health, Dental, Vision
  • Life and LTC Insurance
  • Etc.

Benefits

  • Vacation/PTO
  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • 401k
  • Bonus

So, if you are a Defense Attorney with experience, please apply today!

Colorado employees will receive paid sick leave. For additional information about available benefits, please contact Dylan Rogelstad

Benefits

" Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance

" Life Insurance and Long-Term Disability

" In-house mentoring program
